short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension which loads a reminder todo when opening a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy to use todo tool which appears when you create a new tab.

We do not track or store or share any user data. The code is also opensource.

https://github.com/coderhs/new-tab-reminders
